item.title: EP 145 - The Hairy Devils Of The Southwest
item.itunes:title: The Hairy Devils Of The Southwest
item.description:
Today we run from a floating head, visit Hollywood to hear of a horrifying haunting, then we travel to the desert to examine more Bigfoot sightings than you can shake a desert shrub at!

 

There is a hotel that is considered haunted even though it had only one sighting. And it’s a hotel I never want to go to!

 

Then we go to Hollywood. Bright lights, big stars, and a horrible, horrible nightmare.

 

And finally we travel to the Soutwest United States and find out that not all Bigfoot sightings take place in the woods!

 

MERCH STORE!!!

https://www.redbubble.com/people/deadrabbitradio/works/35749420-dead-rabbit-radio?asc=u

 

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

Dual Flyer
https://i.imgur.com/OhuoI2v.jpg

"As Above" Flyer
https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

 

 

ARIZONA'S HAUNTED HOTELS

http://www.prairieghosts.com/azhotels.html

 

Did Sharon Tate Have a Premonition?

http://www.cielodrive.com/archive/did-sharon-tate-have-a-premonition/

 

"THE CREEPY LITTLE MAN"

http://www.prairieghosts.com/hollywood9.html

 

The Borrego Sandman and Other Desert Dwelling Bigfoot of California

https://mysteriousuniverse.org/2018/03/the-borrego-sandman-and-other-desert-dwelling-bigfoot-of-california/

 

The Borrego Sandman (1939 - Present)

http://www.borregospringschamber.com/BorregoHistory/Borrego_Sandman.htm

 

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

 

------------------------------------------------

 

Logo Art By Ash Black

 

"As Above" Art By Grant Scott

 

Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"

Music By Dr. Huxxxtable

 

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @JasonOCarpenter

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

 

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

 

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018
